name: siphoneer
description:
"siphoneer" is an Endless Runner where you have to kill Goons and use their Ghosts as ammo.

you play as a shotgun turret with one wheel who can't stop moving in a dystopian world where many Goons lay lurking waiting to get massacred by your shotgun!

once you kill any Goon they will turn into a Ghost and try to fly away

Controls:

        Aim with Mouse

        

        Shoot with [LMB]

        

        Siphon Ghosts with [RMB]

        

        Boost by Shooting down

        

press F11 to fullscreen

i would love it if you'll post your high scores in the comments :)

made for Mini Jam 117: Ghosts
